mapper.update: update hiddendanger set plancompletiontime =#{plancompletiontime}, name = #{name}, location = #{location}, govertype = #{govertype}, scale =#{scale}, scalegrad =#{scalegrad}, thisstage = #{thisstage}, completion = #{completion} where `id` = #{id}
mapper.select:
select h.id,h.`name`,h.coordinate,h.location ,g.id as governancetypeid , g.`name` as governancetype ,h.thisstage,h.`completion`, h.plancompletiontime as plancompletiontime , h.plancompletiontime as strplancompletiontime, h.x,h.y,h.govertype,h.scale,h.scalegrad from hiddendanger h ,governancetype g where h.governancetype=g.id and h.name like concat(concat('%', #{name}),'%') and h.governancetype like concat(concat('%', #{governancetype}),'%')
limit #{rows} offset #{start}
